page.title: 02Around Ulcombe (cont.)
page.content: In autumn there are the lovely{apples with the brown leaves with the orange sunsets shining over the cut corn fields;in winter the snow brings fun ,as the area is just outside the{weald which is very hilly on the{north downs .The downs make great tobogganing and as it's in the east the snow comes down heavily! There are many old houses dating back to{'tudor'}times and a lot of new ones!There are ponds scattered everywhere,so it is a good area for fishing.A good point is that there are not fumes and lots of towns but there are odd villages scattered around here in the beautiful {garden of England.
